items.name: Button
items.description: To trigger an operation.

items.name: Icon
items.description: Semantic vector graphics.

items.name: Grid
items.description: 24 Grids System.

items.name: Layout
items.description: Handling the overall layout of a page.

items.name: Avatar
items.description: Avatars can be used to represent people or objects. It supports images, Icons, or letters.

items.name: Badge
items.description: Small numerical value or status descriptor for UI elements.

items.name: Comment
items.description: A comment displays user feedback and discussion to website content.

items.name: Collapse
items.description: A content area which can be collapsed and expanded.

items.name: Carousel
items.description: A carousel component. Scales with its container.

items.name: Card
items.description: Simple rectangular container.

items.name: Calendar
items.description: Container for displaying data in calendar form.

items.name: List
items.description: Simple List.

items.name: Popover
items.description: The floating card popped by clicking or hovering.

items.name: Tree
items.description: Tree structure

items.name: Tooltip
items.description: A simple text popup tip.

items.name: Timeline
items.description: Vertical display timeline.

items.name: Tag
items.description: Tag for categorizing or markup.

items.name: Tabs
items.description: Tabs make it easy to switch between different views.

items.name: Table
items.description: A table displays rows of data.

items.name: AutoComplete
items.description: Autocomplete function of input field.

items.name: Checkbox
items.description: Checkbox component.

items.name: Cascader
items.description: Cascade selection box.

items.name: DatePicker
items.description: To select or input a date.

items.name: Form
items.description: Form is used to collect, validate, and submit the user input, usually contains various form items including checkbox, radio, input, select, and etc.

items.name: InputNumber
items.description: Enter a number within certain range with the mouse or keyboard.

items.name: Input
items.description: A basic widget for getting the user input is a text field. Keyboard and mouse can be used for providing or changing data.

items.name: Mention
items.description: Mention component.

items.name: Rate
items.description: Rate component.

items.name: Radio
items.description: Radio.

items.name: Switch
items.description: Switching Selector.

items.name: Slider
items.description: A Slider component for displaying current value and intervals in range.

items.name: Select
items.description: Select component to select value from options.

items.name: TreeSelect
items.description: Tree selection control.

items.name: Transfer
items.description: Double column transfer choice box.

items.name: TimePicker
items.description: By clicking the input box, you can select a time from a popup panel.

items.name: Upload
items.description: Upload file by selecting or dragging.

items.name: Alert
items.description: Alert component for feedback.

items.name: Drawer
items.description: Panel slides from screen edge.

items.name: Modal
items.description: Modal dialogs.

items.name: Message
items.description: Display global messages as feedback in response to user operations.

items.name: Notification
items.description: Display a notification message globally.

items.name: Progress
items.description: Display the current progress of an operation flow.

items.name: Popconfirm
items.description: A simple and compact confirmation dialog of an action.

items.name: Spin
items.description: A spinner for displaying loading state of a page or a section.

items.name: Skeleton
items.description: Provide a placeholder at the place which need waiting for loading.

items.name: Affix
items.description: Make an element stick to viewport.

items.name: Breadcrumb
items.description: A breadcrumb displays the current location within a hierarchy. It allows going back to states higher up in the hierarchy.

items.name: Dropdown
items.description: A dropdown list.

items.name: Menu
items.description: Menu list of Navigation.

items.name: Pagination
items.description: A long list can be divided into several pages by Pagination, and only one page will be loaded at a time.

items.name: Steps
items.description: Steps is a navigation bar that guides users through the steps of a task.

items.name: Anchor
items.description: Hyperlinks to scroll on one page.

items.name: BackTop
items.description: BackTop makes it easy to go back to the top of the page.

items.name: Divider
items.description: A divider line separates different content.
